# init(integerLiteral:)

**Initializer**

Creates a scalar parameter from an integer literal.

## Declaration

```swift
init(integerLiteral value: Int)
```

## Creating a scalar parameter

- **init(floatLiteral:)**: Creates a scalar parameter from a floating-point literal.

items.description: Creates a scalar parameter from a floating-point literal.
